description: Returns the details of one or more remediation exceptions. A detailed view of a remediation exception for a set of resources that includes an explanation of an exception and the time when the exception will be deleted. When you specify the limit and the next token, you receive a paginated response.

parameters.name: ConfigRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the Config rule.

parameters.name: ResourceKeys
parameters.description: An exception list of resource exception keys to be processed with the current request. Config adds exception for each resource key. For example, Config adds 3 exceptions for 3 resource keys. (dict) --- The details that identify a resource within Config, including the resource type and resource ID. ResourceType (string) --- The type of a resource. ResourceId (string) --- The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_params.name: ResourceId
nested_params.description: The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_items.name: RemediationExceptions
nested_items.description: Returns a list of remediation exception objects.

nested_items.name: ConfigRuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the Config rule.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: An explanation of an remediation exception.

nested_items.name: ExpirationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the remediation exception will be deleted.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned in a previous request that you use to request the next page of results in a paginated response.
